Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: implement ticket generation and email in payment webhook handler

Complete the handlePaymentWebhook implementation by restoring functionality
from the old handleMollieWebhook that was being used by the mock webhook:

- Generate tickets for each line item upon successful payment
- Send order confirmation email with order details
- Maintain transaction atomicity for ticket generation
- Non-critical email failures don''t block the entire flow

This ensures both mock and real Mollie webhooks use identical logic
and handlers, with full ticket generation and notification support.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
fix: prevent duplicate job processing in horizontally scaled workers

Implement atomic job fetching and marking to eliminate race condition where
multiple workers could fetch and process the same job concurrently.

Changes:
- getNextJobs\(\) now atomically fetches pending jobs AND marks them as
  ''processing'' in a single transaction
- Removes separate markJobProcessing\(\) call from worker \(no longer needed\)
- Multiple workers can no longer retrieve the same job
- Prevents duplicate webhook processing, seat releases, and email sends

Critical for production with horizontally scaled worker instances, ensuring:
- No duplicate payment webhook processing
- No race conditions on order status updates
- No duplicate ticket generation
- No duplicate seat releases on payment failure

Co-Authored-By: Claude Haiku 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
